text: @senatemajldr How can anyone vote for Democrats while they politicize Covid19 Pandemic resulting in killing our economy & try to pass Progressive Socialistic programs that will not help businesses that have employees now with no income? Resulting in ruined family income for the basics? 🙃🙏
